info.task: navigate to first cell in grid
info.title: Navigate to the first cell in a grid in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnLastDataCell
setupScript.description: sets focus on the fifth cell of the seventh row in the grid

user: Navigate to the first cell in the grid.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the first cell in the grid.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Text of the column header ('Date') is conveyed
Text of the cell ('01-Jan-16') is conveyed
coordinates of the cell (column 1, row 2) are conveyed
